ai-patthana7.18:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles consisting in thoughts.
ai-patthana7.18:1.1_0: One does not give rise to the cause, for the sake of the teaching,
ai-patthana7.18:2.1_0: Not Dhamma does the cause, he does not condition for the sake of nature,
ai-patthana7.18:2.1_1: Not so, the Dhamma is a condition for the sake of nature,
ai-patthana7.18:2.1_2: The Dhamma is not the cause, and the reason for the sake of all (them) of the Dhamma is the reason why,
ai-patthana7.18:3.1_0: not for the sake of the Dhamma, not for the sake of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana7.18:3.1_1: not for the sake of the Dhamma, not for the sake of (of the teaching),
ai-patthana7.18:3.1_2: is not the cause, for the sake of the Dhamma, and for the sake of all the future,
ai-patthana7.18:4.1_0: Neither in the Dhamma, and in the necessary condition for the sake of all things.
ai-patthana7.18:4.1_1: Neither things is a condition for the sake of (of the future) things, and not for the sake of the Dhamma (to come to),
ai-patthana7.18:4.1_2: Neither in the Dhamma, and in the future is not a condition for the sake of (good) things, and for the sake of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana7.18:4.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana7.18:5.1_0: the nine factors for eighteen bases ...
ai-patthana7.18:5.1_1: After the ninety-three territory had come back,
